Item.text: I think I get it. So, the at symbol can help us connect between posts. What if I want to connect between people?
Great question Jordan. In order to connect people, you need to do something called tagging them in a comment or post.
Symbols on social media can be confusing.
Yes they can, let's move on..
Alright, my password is typed in.
_user_, please press the button that says, login, and we'll jump right in!
That was so cute! But, what would I do if I wanted to find a new video that has nothing to do with the one we just watched? I think it would be cool to post one on my page sometime.
Great question. Let's all work together to figure this issue out.
I learned so much on how to use social media today.

Jordan, wonderful! I hope today's lesson on social media was fun and informative! Social media is a great way to keep in touch with friends, family, colleagues, and people who enjoy the same things as you! Remember, keep your passwords private so that you're the only person with access to your personal pages and try to make sure that you don't share personal information that people could use.
I will definitely remember that! I am looking forward to watching more funny cat videos!
Oh Jordan, there are many more where that came from! I'm so glad you both were here to learn about social media. Well, that concludes today's lesson. You both did so great today! See you next time!
But why does it matter if someone posts something that is inappropriate?
Let's think about it.
So I need to be sure that I only post information about myself that I am comfortable with everyone i'm connected to knowing, right?
That's right, Jordan! Let's move on to navigating through social media websites. Remember, there are many platforms and they are all different, but we can go through some basics.
That makes sense to me. But, what if I don't need to send a private message? What if I want people to see what I wrote?
Well, then you would need to write a comment on that person's page.
If we're on someone's page, how do we view the comments in the first place?
Great question! Let's take a look.
I think I'm starting to get it.
That's great, Jordan! Why don't we look at one more common symbol and then move on to something new.
Great! Now, the first thing we are going to do is talk about safety and security on social media.
Safety and security? What do you mean?
Well, almost anything you put on the internet can be found by other people. It is important to make sure that you do not share personal information that other people could use.
Oh, I see. Maybe, I have already put too much information on my social media profile!
_user_, hello! I'm Cristina and this is Jordan. Today we are going to be talking about social media.
_user_ and Cristina, hi. I actually just got a social media account that we can look at if you want!

Great idea, Jordan! First, let's talk a little bit about social media. Social media platforms come in many forms, including content based and social networking. Social media is a great way to connect with friends, colleagues, and people who have similar interests.
Okay, Can we look at how to use it?
Sure, Jordan. First things first, if you could type in your password please.
Now, sometimes people post things on public social media websites that are .
Yeah, I heard something about this on the news recently.
I'm sure you did, Jordan. It seems to be happening frequently.Let's look into this.
I have a question, Cristina. What is a hash tag and what does it do? I hear about hash tags all the time, but I don't know what they mean.
That's a great question, Jordan! Let's check it out!
Yes! I really like to watch videos on the internet. I have a few friends who post funny cat videos all the time.

Question.text: Exactly, let's take a closer look at Jordan's profile.

Answer.text: I probably should not include my phone number and home address.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The correct answer is, all of the above. Each of these can be a reason to be careful about what is appropriate on specific social media platforms.
